Search

Usage Guidelines

Use this component to show search results as users type (styles only).

The search component is a specialized type of input field. It includes a search icon in the input field and has an optional search results list to display results below the search box.

Styles only

This component only includes styling and layout. Retrieving search results, including displaying results as users type, will need to be handled by your application.

Basic search box

Use this standalone search box when your results are going to be displayed on a different page or another place on the current page.

Inline results

When you want to show users search results as they type, this style allows you to display the results with the matching characters highlighted.

  • Viatribunali
  • Viatryl A

Dropdown-style results

Use this modified search pattern when you want the search results to appear as a dropdown list.

Dropdown results
  • Viatribunali
  • Viatryl A
Dropdown with metadata
  • Chris Irwin IMS Health
  • Christina Lewis Knife and Fox
